short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension with auto-scroll feature

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of endless scrolling while reading online? This extension is here to help! With our tool, you can focus on the content without manually scrolling down the page. Simply activate the extension, and it will automatically scroll for you at a comfortable pace, allowing you to read without interruption. You can customize the scrolling speed to match your reading style and pause or resume anytime with a single click. Whether you're reading articles, blogs, or long web pages, our extension ensures a smoother and more convenient browsing experience. Say goodbye to constant manual scrolling
